headline: BAE Systems awarded $22 million U.S. Navy contract for Mk 41 Vertical Launch System canisters
summary: BAE Systems (LON: BA) was awarded a $22 million contract by the U.S. Navy to produce missile canisters for the Mk 41 Vertical Launching Systems (VLS), with the total value potentially reaching $317 million if all options are exercised. This follows a contract award with a total value of $738 million for Mk 41 VLS missile launching canisters last July. These awards reflect BAE Systems' leading expertise in missile launch canisters for the U.S. Navy.

headline: How Does Boeing's 19% Drop Stack Up Against Its True Value in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Boeing is a smart buy right now? You are not alone, as plenty of investors are trying to figure out whether recent headlines have made the stock a bargain or a trap. Boeing’s share price has dropped 19.1% over the past month, even though it is still up 4.2% so far this year and 17.0% over the last twelve months. This volatility raises questions about where it goes next. Recent news around production challenges and ongoing delivery suspensions has weighed heavily on market...
